humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, sentinel lymph node #1 has metastatic carcinoma in 2 out of 2 lymph nodes (2/2), and sentinel lymph node #2 and the left axillary contents have no metastases (0/1 and 0/25, respectively). Therefore, the patient's N stage is N1 as per Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are 28 lymph nodes removed, and metastatic carcinoma is found in 2 out of 28 lymph nodes (2/28). This corresponds to pN1a stage.
